glsa.title: VLC: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in VLC, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: VLC is a cross-platform media player and streaming server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in VLC. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted subtitles file, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All VLC users should upgrade to the latest version:
